points.title: Independent Sales Management
points.description: Handled everything from sourcing, pricing, and selling clothes independently, building strong customer relationships to ensure steady sales.

points.title: High Sales Achievement
points.description: Sold up to 134 items in one day, increasing sales through understanding customer needs and effective pitching.

points.title: Customer Engagement
points.description: Engaged with customers to help them find the right clothes, ensuring they were satisfied and likely to return.

points.title: Inventory Management
points.description: Managed inventory and adjusted prices to keep the stall stocked with popular items, boosting profits.

points.title: Social Media Promotion
points.description: Used social media and word-of-mouth to attract more customers and increase visibility.

points.title: Student Recruitment
points.description: Successfully recruited over 100 students, enhancing enrollment numbers and contributing to the growth of the institution.

points.title: Teacher Interviewing
points.description: Conducted interviews and evaluations for potential teachers, ensuring the hiring of qualified and competent staff.

points.title: Customer Complaint Handling
points.description: Efficiently resolved over 50 customer complaints, improving overall customer satisfaction and retention rates.

points.title: Procurement Management
points.description: Managed the procurement of desks, chairs, and other classroom necessities, ensuring timely and cost-effective acquisitions.

points.title: Staff Management
points.description: Oversaw daily management of teachers, including meal coordination, sleep schedules, and shift planning, ensuring smooth operations and staff well-being.

points.title: Scheduling
points.description: Developed and maintained teacher schedules, optimizing resource allocation and minimizing conflicts.

points.title: Exceptional Customer Service
points.description: Consistently provided exceptional customer service, ensuring a positive dining experience by anticipating customer needs and addressing any concerns promptly.

points.title: Proactive Complaint Handling
points.description: Effectively managed customer complaints, resolving issues quickly and professionally to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.

points.title: Menu Expertise & Recommendations
points.description: Developed a deep understanding of the menu, offering tailored recommendations to enhance customer satisfaction and guide them in their selections.

points.title: Efficient Order Processing & Coordination
points.description: Processed orders efficiently and communicated seamlessly with kitchen staff to ensure timely and accurate food delivery.

points.title: Maintaining Hygiene & Cleanliness
points.description: Upheld the highest standards of cleanliness, ensuring a safe and hygienic environment for customers and staff alike.

points.title: UI/UX Interface Enhancement
points.description: Enhanced UI/UX using <s>Photoshop<s> and <s>Figma<s>, integrating a Customer Behaviour Analytics module that increased user engagement by 54% through improved gaze metrics.

points.title: E-commerce Platform Optimization
points.description: Overhauled the e-commerce platform with <s>HTML<s>, <s>CSS<s>, <s>JavaScript<s>, and <s>React<s>, enhancing user experience and payment processes. Designed dedicated product pages and promotional posters, significantly boosting product visibility and sales.

points.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
points.description: Boosted website performance and SEO by 22% and 14% respectively, utilizing <s>Google Chrome DevTools<s> and <s>Lighthouse<s> for targeted optimizations.

points.title: Performance Reporting System Development
points.description: Developed a dynamic performance reporting system using <s>React<s> and <s>Tailwind<s>, enhanced with <s>Framer Motion<s> animations. This system features Excel export capabilities, providing management with detailed, actionable insights.

points.title: Achieving Excellence in Business Audits
points.description: Responsible for auditing the invoices of the business office up to RMB1,000,000, drawing up contracts up to RMB100,000, compliance review and signing.

points.title: Streamlined Business Audit Processes
points.description: The business is responsible for the assessment and audit of the business system and occasional audits of the accounts flow according to the monthly and annual reports of the business.

points.title: Efficiency Improvement through Office Automation Software
points.description: During the course of the work, it was found that the business progress audit was a single simple and time-consuming task, and with the help of office automation software, the business audit workload of this position for a year was completed in half a day, receiving high praise and commendation from the Business Office Director.

points.title: Efficient Delivery Management
points.description: Completed over 500 deliveries with an average delivery time of under 30 minutes, ensuring timely and accurate service to customers.

points.title: Customer Communication
points.description: Maintained high customer satisfaction through professional and courteous communication, resolving any issues promptly to ensure positive experiences.By editing some messages in advance, it improves the response time of interaction with customers and significantly increases user satisfaction.

points.title: Route Optimization
points.description: Utilized navigation tools and local knowledge to optimize delivery routes, reducing costs and improving delivery efficiency.

points.title: Safety and Compliance
points.description: Strictly adhered to traffic laws and safety guidelines, achieving a record of zero accidents or violations during the entire tenure.

points.title: Efficient Delivery
points.description: Efficiently completed takeout delivery tasks, ensuring punctual and safe delivery of meals, and improving customer satisfaction.

points.title: Pre-Edited Text Templates
points.description: Prepared and edited a variety of text templates in advance to quickly communicate with customers when problems arise and improve service efficiency.

points.title: Emergency Response
points.description: Quickly responded to emergencies by using pre-edited text templates to promptly inform customers about order progress, ensuring timely communication while safeguarding customer privacy during delivery.

points.title: Handling Multiple Orders
points.description: Handled multiple order tasks during peak hours to maintain efficient operations and increase daily order deliveries.

points.title: Traffic & Safety Compliance
points.description: Complied with traffic regulations to ensure safe and proper operation during delivery.

points.title: Vehicle Maintenance
points.description: Maintained good vehicle condition and checked equipment regularly to ensure smooth delivery.

title: Web Developer
name: Gobell Membership System
des: Developed a membership management system for Gobell from scratch, including features like member login, registration, orders, products, payment processing, deposits, and credential verification.

points.title: Developed and maintained Apps
points.description: Developed and maintained Apps using <s>HTML<s>, <s>CSS<s>, <s>React.js<s>, <s>Next.js<s>, <s>Redux<s>, improving web performance by 20%.

points.title: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs
points.description: Developed and maintained <s>RESTful APIs<s> using <s>Node.js<s>, <s>Express.js<s>,<s>Python<s>, <s>C#<s> and <s>.NET<s>, following best practices.

points.title: Integrated third-party services
points.description: Integrated third-party services such as <s>Twilio<s>, <s>Shopify<s>, <s>Mapbox<s>, <s>Strapi<s> and <s>Stripe<s>, enhancing functionality.

points.title: Wrote and optimized SQL queries
points.description: Wrote and optimized <s>SQL<s> queries to improve database performance.

points.title: Implemented unit and end-to-end tests
points.description: Implemented unit and end-to-end tests using <s>Jest<s> and <s>Cypress<s>, reducing errors by 30%.

points.title: Optimized deployment pipeline
points.description: Optimized <s>GitHub Actions<s>, <s>Docker<s> and <s>AWS<s>, cutting deployment time by 50%.

points.title: Authentication and security
points.description: Experienced with <s>OAuth<s>, <s>JWT<s> authentication, and security best practices.

points.title: Implemented i18n solutions
points.description: Implemented <s>i18n<s> solutions using <s>react-i18next<s>, enabling seamless multi-language support.

points.title: AWS and cloud technologies
points.description: Experienced with <s>AWS<s> (<s>EC2<s>, <s>S3<s>, <s>Lambda<s>, <s>Terraform<s>), eager to upskill in <s>Azure<s> cloud technologies.

points.title: Designed UI and implemented design system
points.description: Designed UI in <s>Figma<s> and implemented inner design system using <s>Tailwind<s>, <s>Framer Motion<s>, <s>GSAP<s>, and <s>3.js<s>.

points.title: Optimized SEO
points.description: Optimized <s>SEO<s> by improving web elements like <s>meta tags<s>, <s>headers<s> and <s>content structure<s> using <s>Google Analytics<s> and <s>Lighthouse<s>.

points.title: Worked in Agile environments
points.description: Worked in <s>Agile<s> environments using <s>Jira<s> or <s>Scrum<s>, collaborating cross-functionally for efficient development.
